treasures.name: Campfire
treasures.description: The first hero to visit the campfire finds a random amount of gold and resources. The campfire can only be visited once, and then it disappears

treasures.name: Flotsam
treasures.description: The first hero to visit the flotsam finds a random amount of wood and gold. The flotsam can only be visited once, and then it disappears

treasures.name: Lean to
treasures.description: The first hero to visit the lean to finds a random amount of resources. The lean to gives no further resources on subsequent visits. They usually appear on snowy terrain on official maps

treasures.name: Mystical Garden
treasures.description: Leprechaun in that garden gives gems or gold. The garden can only be visited for a reward once per week

treasures.name: Sea Chest
treasures.description: Usually contains gold, and sometimes artifacts. There is no battle, and it may only be visited once

treasures.name: Shipwreck Survivor
treasures.description: The first hero to rescue the survivor, is granted a random artifact. There is no cost, no battle, and can only be visited once

treasures.name: Skeleton
treasures.description: When the hero approaches the skeleton, they have a chance of obtaining a minor artifact or nothing at all

treasures.name: Treasure Chest
treasures.description: Treasure chest contains a varying amount of gold. When picked up by a hero, they can either keep the gold, or give it away for experience

treasures.name: Wagon
treasures.description: When a hero approaches the wagon, they have a chance of obtaining a minor artifact, random resource or nothing at all

treasures.name: Warrior's Tomb
treasures.description: When a hero approaches the tomb, they have a chance of obtaining a random artifact, but reduces the morale of troops by -3. It will also reduce morale on subsequent visits

treasures.name: Waterwheel
treasures.description: The waterwheel provides a random amount of gold when visited by a hero. It can only be visited once per week

treasures.name: Windmill
treasures.description: The windmill provides a small amount of a random resource when visited by a hero. It can only be visited once per week
